channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Mattress, grill and chairs among assorted other litter, britten place, 24th May
item.description:
Can someone clean it up please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Britten Place, St Mark's, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor and uneven reinstatement of pavement outside janes pantry following it being dug up for gas pipe works, 23rd May
item.description:
Poor and uneven reinstatement of pavement outside janes pantry following it being dug up for gas pipe works

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 200, Bath Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedge, 23rd May
item.description:
This person trims their hedge a little bit it needs a good cut back because it’s overgrown into a big chunk of the footpath making it very Narrow and bikes come around the bend at speed and due to the overgrown hedge you don’t see the bike until they’re near on top of you. Please could the owner be asked to cut it right back so we have full access of the footpath again? There’s barely enough room for one person to get past, never mind a double buggy. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Princess Elizabeth Way, Arle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hedge overgrown, 23rd May
item.description:
The hedge is so overgrown that pedestrians have barely any room and if you dare walk in the bike lane you near get knocked over, get abuse for being in the cycle lane or some people do politely say excuse me please and u have to squeeze up against the hedge. It’s just needs cutting back so we have have the full pavement. Every year the pavement is getting smaller and smaller. It needs a good cutting back

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Princess Elizabeth Way, Arle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Needs some TLC, 23rd May
item.description:
Currently suspended due to cycle route work, but needs a good clean and sort before it is re-openned.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Chippings on Pavement, 23rd May
item.description:
Owner No 86 Cheltenham Road East. (Preferably reported as 84, having fallen on chippings in the dark. Sorry)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Hedge overgrown, 23rd May
item.description:
This hedge is getting very overgrown and year on year it’s taking up more of the pathway. Could do with being cut back. I think maybe the couple in the house are struggling with it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Glynbridge Gardens, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes between railway station roundabout and Alstone lane traffic lights, 23rd May
item.description:
There are multiple deep potholes on this section of road and they’ve been there for months- very dangerous as drivers are having to swerve to avoid damage to there vehicles
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Townsend Street, St Paul’s, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous potholes & poor road surface in Malleson Rd, Gotherington, 22nd May
item.description:
No action taken at all in this location, mainly between The Shutter pub & the Junction with the A 435.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 101, Malleson Road, Gotherington, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Scandalous road condition, 22nd May
item.description:
Extensive pot holes over a 100m stretch of road. Drivers forced to use kerb, off road elements to avoid each other and the shocking road. Almost no driverrs are watching each other just the horrendous road to avoid damaging their cars. When will the highways department sort this out!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Pothole on junction

item.title: Overgrown Weeds on Pavements, 21st May
item.description:
There are tall weeds growing on either side of the pavement which need urgent attention please
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Bennington Street, St Paul’s, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface or broken up between 7 Kingsley gardens and Tennyson Road, 21st May
item.description:
This small side road is effectively a pavement for the people living on Kingsley Gardens. One senior resident is having great difficulty using the walker to get along to Tennyson Road. Please fix the surface from 7 Kingsley Gardens down to Tennyson Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Kingsley Gardens, St Mark's, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose and noisy manhole cover, 20th May
item.description:
There is a large manhole cover in Libertus road just round the corner from Grimwade Close that clatters loudly every time it is driven over. It’s keeping me awake in Grimwade Close so goodness knows how loud it is for the houses that it is right outside
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24;26, Libertus Road, Rowanfield, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rose and Crown Passage, St Paul’s, Cheltenham

item.title: Drain is blocked and smells pretty bad, possible health hazard, 20th May
item.description:
This drain was cleared last year but I’m afraid it’s blocked again. We have tried clearing it with buckets of water but no joy.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 104, Fairview Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Long deep pothole approx 10 feet in length, 20th May
item.description:
The state of the entire road up to the junction of Bouncers Lane is terrible. Been very poor for at least 18 months. Every car driver swerves to avoid and buses slow. Its a safety hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Priors Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass and litter everywhere, 20th May
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Newdawn Place, Arle, Cheltenham

item.title: Vehicles blocking pavement, 20th May
item.description:
